item.title: Trump attacks Powell again amid Fed independence fears: 'Incompetent' or 'crooked'
Trump says any country doing business with Iran will face 25% U.S. tariff
item.description: Trump's tariff post targeting Iran comes as the oil-rich country struggles to suppress an ongoing swell of massive anti-government protests.

item.title: Iran’s regime in its ‘final days and weeks' after mass protests, Germany’s Merz says
item.description: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz on Tuesday said the embattled Iranian regime appears to be finished.

item.title: Trump’s tariff gambit over Iran risks derailing U.S.–China trade deal
item.description: President Donald Trump's threat of 25% tariffs on countries doing business with Iran has raised the risk of derailing Washington's fragile trade deal ...

item.title: Powell investigation: Drumbeat of Republican opposition grows on Capitol Hill
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he was under investigation on Sunday night, the latest episode in President Donald Trump's feud with him.
